message:
السلام عليكم. كنت محتاج اتعلم ازاى اعمل mobile app. تركيزى كله عالاندرويد... 
ادامى طريقين و محتار مابينهم... 
React native ولا ال native android development...
انا عندى خلفية كويسة فى الاتنين. بس معملتش بيهم برامج نهاءى. طبعا مش هينفع اذاكر الاتنين.. 
طبيعى ميال لل react way لانها اسهل. بس لسة محتار...
سؤالى هنا يا ترى ما هى ال react native limitations in creating android app ???
و هل فى مميزات ضخمة فى واحد عن التانى تخليه يكسب الاختيار ؟؟؟

data.message: I personally think unless you have a very demanding application that needs to be fully native, don't really go for native but rather for a cross platform tech, the options are great be it React Native, Ionic, Xamarin or plain old Cordova, but just to be absolutely honest I am not a mobile developer, but just giving personal opinion, and I would love to hear others as well
لو هتعمل برنامج واحد وعايز تخلص اختار الأسهل لك والأسرع. لو حاجة long-term أو عايز تركز فيها للcareer بتاعك، يبقى أكيد native.

"If you are looking for creating KILLER apps then surely go native. however if you are just looking for an app that is just Forms then go for a cross-platform" <-- my general outline -I'm not sure of it though-

The mobile industry in my opinion is now either Android or iOS, personally as a person who develop for iOS and NEVER developed on cross platform tools -so my advice might not be that correct- . i would say go and learn both (iOS & Andriod) for some reasons
1- xCode is changing rapidly and with every new iOS new features are added, I don't know how other cross platform deal with that
2- If you are looking for work, being expect in iOS or Android widen your options vs. looking for a company that only looks for the tool you are using
3- Learning two languages are not that hard!

I heard some positive reviews on react :) but lets shortcut this ! how many trials in cross and still not mature with bugs and limitations ! Phone gap , titanium , ionic ... etc .. and you will somehow go back to native. all big companies started its mobile apps in cross platform now its rare to find a big company with a cross app.
How about nativescript? (We are using it ) and decision made after long discussion and study best fit.
رأيي ما تضيعش وقتك في السؤال، بلل قدميك بماء النهر في مشروع بسيط.
